item.title: "They're All Going Halfway To Alzheimer's": Ridley Scott Explains Why His Gladiator Emperors Are All Volatile
item.description: Gladiator II director Ridley Scott explains why he believes all the Roman emperors in his Gladiator movies have serious lead poisoning.

item.title: Henry Cavill’s Highlander Reboot Goes “Beyond Present-Day”, Director Teases Story & Confirms New Filming Plan
item.description: John Wick director Chad Stahelski teases the action and diverse settings to come in his upcoming reboot of the 1986 fantasy epic Highlander.

item.title: Spellbound Voice Cast & Character Guide
item.description: The cast for Netflix's Skydance Animated movie Spellbound includes A-listers and Broadway actors who have won multiple awards..
